title: I HAVE A OLD MOBILE HOME I STAY IN  MOBILE HOME PARK. DURING A ICE STORM A TREE FELL ON MY TRAILER. I DO NOT HAVE INSURANCE ,BECAUSE MOBILE HOME IS TO OLD. I WILL LIKE TO KNOW IF THE PEOPLE OVER THE PARK IS RESPONSIBLE
